title: Ampersands
content:
I am a fan of [www.simpledesktops.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016013757/http:/www.simpledesktops.com/ "www.simpledesktops.com") so it was a thrill to have curator Tom Watson put up my White Ampersands design. The ampersand was handlettered with a round nib and black India ink. I then scanned it and cleaned it up in AI. No, not artificial intelligence.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016013757im_/http:/typophile.com/files/white_ampersands_detail_6179.jpg)
author: John Lyttle

comments.content: I enjoyed this, but when i put it as my desktop background i realised how much it reminds me of the teal windows 98 wallpaper. sorry :( the teal colour will forever be ruined by windows.

Thanks for your feedback, Laurence! The colour is what Pantone has named [Colour of the Year for 2010](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016013757/http:/www.pantone.com/pages/Pantone/Pantone.aspx?pg=20705&ca=4). I had no idea Windows 98 used that colour.
